::Shadow Wing::

She took his hand and gently wrapped her hand around his.  She was 
glad to see that he wasn't hurt.  She took a step closer to him so 
ther was only a few inches of space between them. She smiled.
"I'm glad to hear that you are OK." She leaned closer to him and 
whispered into his ear,"But trust me my beloved, if I ever get eaten 
by a cat like that again, just shoot me and get it over with. Or you 
will never hear the end of it. Got it?"  She kissed him on the cheek 
and looked at him.  she smiled and chuckled."I've nightmares about it 
since. And my TeddyOwl is no help." She smiled warmly at him.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> "Glad to see your up and about Wing" Lunarpine said with a grin on 
his bot
> face." Lets make a deal, how about we stop taking turns putting 
each other
> in the CR chamber and avoid getting hurt to begin with." he held 
his hand
> out to her.
